import {useState} from 'react'; import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Context from "../../Context" const Publicaciones = () => { const{tienda} = useContext (Context); const [publicD, setPublicD] = useState ({}) const filteredData = tienda.filter((e) => e.idUs === 1); setPublicD(filteredData) console.log (publicD) return ( <>
{filteredData.map((elem) =>(
{elem.name}
${(elem.price).toLocaleString("es-Cl")}
))}
) } export default Publicaciones
